long_description: This twenty-four gallon Rubbermaid(R) storage container is perfect for keeping lots of gear organized around the house and in the car. Detached lid stays on tight with two side handles; latches can lock for extra security (lock not included). Durable Rubbermaid construction will withstand years of use.
short_description: This twenty-four gallon Rubbermaid(R) storage container is perfect for keeping lots of gear organized around the house and in the car.
